items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 345 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 70.
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 4 years on Untappd!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 125 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 26.

user.bio: I enjoy drinking a new beer every day. Quality over quantity. I also enjoy travelling and drinking beer.
Conquering the world one beer at a time.

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 300 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 61!

beer.beer_name: Some Came Apricot Pale Ale (Small Batch Ltd)
